entry.title: Python Recommended Package
entry.content:
yolk

yolk 可以列出所有已安裝的python package。

sudo easy_install yolk

常用指令

yolk -l

列出package，並且列出其狀態

yolk -a

列出active的package

yolk -U

列出可以升級的package

entry.title: python Ubuntu install package tool
entry.content:
Install Easyinstall

sudo apt-get install build-essential python-setuptools python-dev

Install pip

sudo easy_install pip

Install python package

sudo easy_install <package>

or

sudo pip <package>

Reference:

[1] http://www.openfoundry.org/tw/tech-column/8536-introduction-of-python-extension-management-tools

entry.title: pip-Unknown-command-install
entry.content:
When seeing this error, it may be that you have installed pip so, you need to remove pip

sudo apt-get remove pip

Then, install python-pip

sudo apt-get install python-pip

reference
[1] http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8013581/pip-not-working
